name: Falcon City of Rock Idaho a Climber's Guide
categories: City of Rock Idaho a Climber's Guide
description: In a high-desert corner of the state sits a granite sport climbing mecca. Idaho's City of Rocks attracts climbers from across the country and around the world. Renowned for fascinating geography, plentiful moderate routes, and unique summits, it also has a rustic western atmosphere and scenic camping. This edition offers up-to-date information, maps and topos detailing over 750 climbs. Also included are details about local amenities, camping, geology, area trails, climbing folklore and other Idaho climbing spots.
